short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add's volume sliders to the ingame options menu allowing you to adjust the background music and mic feed volumes to your liking!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Isotopium Volume Sliders extension adds much needed music and noise volume sliders into the settings menu of an active game.

Chosen volume settings are automatically saved and loaded the next time you play so there is no need to re-adjust the slider each time, this also helps from being blasted by the loud music. 

Possible Bugs:
* Occasionally due to the design of the game, the slider values may become overwritten, however these is theoretical at this stage and is yet to be observed.
